hero.title: Prepare for Emergencies with AI-Powered Personal Emergency Preparedness Records
hero.subtitle: Create comprehensive emergency plans, get real-time alerts, and receive intelligent assistance when you need it most. Our multi-agent AI system ensures you're always prepared.

aiShowcase.title: Powered by Advanced AI Agents
aiShowcase.subtitle: Our intelligent system uses specialized AI agents working together to provide comprehensive emergency assistance and preparedness guidance.

coordinator.title: Coordinator Agent
coordinator.description: Manages conversations and routes requests to specialized agents

emergency.title: Emergency Response Agent
emergency.description: Provides immediate emergency guidance and real-time assistance

pepr.title: PEPR Management Agent
pepr.description: Helps create and manage Personal Emergency Preparedness Records

realTimeChat.title: Real-time Chat
realTimeChat.subtitle: Available Now
realTimeChat.description: Instant AI assistance when you need it

smartRouting.title: Smart Routing
smartRouting.subtitle: AI-Powered
smartRouting.description: Automatically connects you to the right specialist

features.title: Everything you need for emergency preparedness
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools and AI assistance to keep you and your family safe during any emergency situation.

aiChat.title: Multi-Agent AI Chat System
aiChat.description: Get instant help from specialized AI agents trained for emergency response, PEPR management, and preparedness planning.

peprManagement.title: Personal Emergency Preparedness Records
peprManagement.description: Create, manage, and share detailed emergency plans with contact information, medical data, and evacuation routes.

realTimeAlerts.title: Real-Time Emergency Alerts
realTimeAlerts.description: Receive instant notifications about emergencies in your area with location-based alerts and status updates.

emergencyMapping.title: Interactive Emergency Maps
emergencyMapping.description: Visualize active emergencies, evacuation routes, and safe zones with real-time mapping technology.

statusTracking.title: Family Status Tracking
statusTracking.description: Keep track of family members' safety status during emergencies with instant updates and notifications.

adminDashboard.title: Emergency Management Dashboard
adminDashboard.description: Comprehensive admin tools for emergency coordinators to manage alerts, track responses, and coordinate resources.
